Morphological analysis for Japanese text by web chamame

Source: R/moranajp.R
web_chamame.Rd

Using https://chamame.ninjal.ac.jp/ and rvest.

Usage

out_cols_chamame(col_lang = "jp")

web_chamame(text, col_lang = "jp")

html_radio_set(form, ...)

is_radio(fields)

Arguments

col_lang

A text. "jp" or "en"

text

A text.

form

vest_form object

...

dynamic-dots Name-value pairs giving radio button to modify.

fields

$fields in vest_form object

Value

A character vector

A dataframe

vest_form object

A boolean or vector

Examples

text <-
  paste0("\\u3059",
         paste0(rep("\\u3082",8),collapse=""),
         "\\u306e\\u3046\\u3061") |>
  unescape_utf()
web_chamame(text)
#> Submitting with button .
#> # A tibble: 7 × 6
#>   表層形 品詞  品詞細分類1 品詞細分類2 品詞細分類3 原形 
#>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>       <chr>       <lgl>       <chr>
#> 1 すもも 名詞  普通名詞    "一般"      NA          李   
#> 2 も     助詞  係助詞      ""          NA          も   
#> 3 もも   名詞  普通名詞    "一般"      NA          腿   
#> 4 も     助詞  係助詞      ""          NA          も   
#> 5 も     助詞  係助詞      ""          NA          も   
#> 6 もの   名詞  普通名詞    "サ変可能"  NA          物   
#> 7 うち   名詞  普通名詞    "一般"      NA          家   

text <-
  paste0("\\u3059",
         paste0(rep("\\u3082",8),collapse=""),
         "\\u306e\\u3046\\u3061") |>
  unescape_utf()
html <- rvest::read_html("https://chamame.ninjal.ac.jp/index.html")
form <-
  rvest::html_form(html)[[1]] |>
  rvest::html_form_set(st = text) |>
  html_radio_set("out-e" = "html")
resp <- rvest::html_form_submit(form)
#> Submitting with button .
rvest::read_html(resp) |>
  rvest::html_table() |>
  `[[`(_, 1)
#> # A tibble: 13 × 224
#>    X1    X2    X3    X4    X5    X6    X7    X8    X9    X10   X11   X12   X13  
#>    <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>

#>  7 現代… ""    ""    ""    ""    ""    ""    ""    ""    ""    ""    ""    "←→"
